amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 as printed in the Congressional Record to increase the bill's $726 million subsidy appropriation to the Ex-Im Bank by $64 million; to reduce the bill's $1.2 billion development assistance appropriation by $60 million; and to reduce the bill's $465.8 million appropriation for AID operating expenses by $4 million.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Lightfoot amendment was withdrawn.
